column4: i regularly unmount my usb thumb drive before physically unplugging it -- am i wasting my time?
yah, it seems wise enough and not excessive work on my part
i can't figure how to unmount under windoz tho so i just pull it out -- i cross my fingers, i'm not writing to the drive under windoz, only reading to printer

you are not wasting your time, notice that if you send a large file to the trash can and you try to unplug the device without unmounting, it will leave part of that file into the pen drive but it will be not visible, just an example
